title: Trade Promotion Management Dashboard
description: Greenfield implementation of SAP S/4HANA 2022 for a global health-food FMCG company replacing legacy Oracle ERP, Excel-based trade promotion management, and custom .NET warehouse systems.
goal: Implement SAP S/4HANA 2022 as the single source of truth. Redesign core processes (Order-to-Cash, Procure-to-Pay) using SAP best practices, with a key focus on a modern, intuitive user experience for the sales team.
outcomes: Successfully delivered modern TPM dashboard with real-time promotion analytics, RAP-based rebate management app, and cloud-native side-by-side extensions maintaining clean core principles.

title: S/4HANA Technical Conversion
description: Technical conversion from SAP ECC 6.0 to SAP S/4HANA 1909 for a premium automotive manufacturer with 15+ years of custom ABAP developments including enhancements, custom transactions, and Z-reports.
goal: Execute a technical conversion to SAP S/4HANA 1909, minimizing business disruption by retaining validated business logic while ensuring technical compliance and performance on the HANA database.
outcomes: Led successful code remediation of 500+ custom programs, achieved 95% HANA optimization on critical reports, and ensured zero business disruption during go-live.

title: Global Finance Template with Localization
description: Hybrid implementation merging two legacy SAP systems (US & EU) and adopting a new S/4HANA global template for Finance with country-specific localized processes including Italian Electronic Invoicing and Spanish VAT ledgers.
goal: Implement a new global S/4HANA template for Finance (Universal Journal, Central Finance) while migrating country-specific localized processes to meet legal deadlines.
outcomes: Delivered global intercompany cost allocation app, adapted FatturaPA compliance for Italy, built Spanish VAT reporting extension on BTP, maintaining clean core architecture.

title: India GST Rollout
description: Rollout project adapting UK/EU S/4HANA 2021 global template to comply with Indian statutory requirements including Goods and Services Tax (GST) and localized payroll components.
goal: Adapt the global SAP template to comply with Indian statutory requirements: Goods and Services Tax (GST) and localized payroll components, with minimal deviation from global process design.
outcomes: Extended Fiori apps for GST fields, developed Adobe Forms for GSTR-1 invoices, created analytical CDS views for India-specific reporting, and integrated with third-party payroll via CPI.

title: SAP RISE Cloud Migration
description: Lift & Shift migration of on-premise S/4HANA system to SAP RISE, focusing on cloud compliance and code remediation.
goal: Move S/4HANA system to SAP RISE while ensuring cloud compliance and optimizing performance for cloud environment.
outcomes: Remediated code for cloud compliance, replaced hardcoded file paths with BTP Object Store APIs, configured SSCUI for business user self-service, achieved successful cloud migration.

title: Azure IaaS Rehosting
description: OS/DB migration of SAP ECC system to Azure IaaS with performance optimization focus.
goal: Rehost ECC system to Azure IaaS while significantly improving performance of critical business processes.
outcomes: Rewrote month-end sales aggregation using CDS Views and HANA optimization, reducing runtime from 4 hours to 15 minutes. Successful Azure migration with improved performance.

title: Salesforce & AWS S3 Integration
description: Integration project connecting on-premise S/4HANA with Salesforce CRM for lead-to-order process and AWS S3 for storing engineering drawings linked to material masters.
goal: Integrate S/4HANA with Salesforce (CRM) for lead-to-order and with Amazon Web Services (S3) for storing large engineering drawings linked to material masters.
outcomes: Built OData services for Salesforce sync via Integration Suite, implemented secure AWS S3 integration for document storage using RAP and HTTP client, enabling seamless multi-cloud architecture.

title: Equipment Maintenance App Modernization
description: Modernization of legacy Web Dynpro equipment maintenance application to SAP Fiori Elements with geolocation and document AI capabilities.
goal: Modernize the legacy Web Dynpro application to a SAP Fiori Elements app, add geolocation capabilities for field technicians, and integrate with SAP Document Management Service.
outcomes: Built full-stack RAP business object, created Fiori Elements List Report & Object Page, integrated geolocation with Leaflet maps, implemented Document AI for automatic data extraction from maintenance photos.
